column1: '''Ronald Eduard Kyrmse''' (b. [[30 April]] [[1952]]) is a Brazilian [[Tolkien]] scholar and founder of the first Brazilian Tolkien Society in [[1989]], called [[Heren Hyarmen]] (changed in [[2003]] to Heren Hyarmeno). He translated most of Tolkien's books that have been published in Brazilian Portuguese. He is a member of [[Tolkien Society]] and used to belong to Quendili, the Society's Elvish study group.
